posts.post_title: Old Judge Two Player Card Sale
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Bruce Kasarda
Offered 4 Sale are the following listed Old Judge two player cards.

Nicol and Riley - SGC 20 $1000
Welch and Gleason -- SGC Auth $750 (does not appear to have a reason for an authentic grade)
Clark and Hughes -- Raw ex 750
Fields and Barkely -- PSA 2 - 500

Scans available. Thanks Bruce Kasarda
